channel.title: Scorned frame error (told me to report to devs)
channel.description:
#### What happened? 1. I was scorned 2. I used frame on my target (6) who was a Psychic 3. Ability gave me error and told me to report to dev 4. I assume he was not framed
Screen cap: https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/875251874246492347/630654F8F71493E4B74AFB05CC67C64B7E3197CD/
Log_output: http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=27473298947286543715
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? No error in framing
#### Steps to reproduce: No idea, has never happened to me before.
#### Comments:

item.description:
